components.name: FTpnir
components.content:
We need to ask some questions to check you can apply for this funding. We'll check:
  • the type of organisation you are applying from
  • the legal status of your organisation
  • that your proposal has been co-produced with social housing tenants
  • the amount of funding you are applying for
  • that you would be willing to compile a case study after delivering your project (which will be shared publicly)

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: vKVvTB
components.content:
Based on your answer, you're not eligible to apply for funding to improve social housing quality and strengthen tenants' voices.

You must be applying from one of the types of organisations listed.

Check who can apply in the Social Housing Innovation Fund prospectus.

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: dDKGEQ

Based on your answer, you're not eligible to apply for funding to improve social housing quality and strengthen tenants' voices.

Your proposal must have been co-produced with social housing tenants.

components.name: ZERrud
components.content:
Based on your answer, you're not eligible to apply for funding to improve social housing quality and strengthen tenants' voices.

The total amount of funding you are applying for must not exceed £100,000.

Check who can apply in the Social Housing Innovation Fund prospectus.

Based on your answer, you're not eligible to apply for funding to improve social housing quality and strengthen tenants' voices.

You must be able to compile a case study following the delivery of your project, and make this publicly available.

Check who can apply in the Social Housing Innovation Fund prospectus.

components.name: kpeyOo

Based on your answer, you're not eligible to apply for funding to improve social housing quality and strengthen tenants' voices.

Your organisation must match one of the legal statuses listed.

Check who can apply in the Social Housing Innovation Fund prospectus.

items.text: My organisation will not make a profit from activities supported by grant funding

items.text: Any awarded funding will not be used to undertake political activity nor support ideological or extremist causes ('extremism' is defined in the 2011 Prevent strategy as vocal or active opposition to fundamental British values, including democracy, the rule of law, individual liberty and mutual respect and tolerance of different faiths and beliefs)
